Name: Maken-shi Sara
About the game: Explore the parallel world with a wizard girl in this transforming heroine RPG! ■Plot One day, Kurose Sara, runs into Amy the devil and acquires the ability to transform into 'Maken-shi', a warrior that fights evil! In order to stop the devils, Maken-shi Sara heads to the dungeons filled with evil beings! ■Game system - Orthodox turn based RPG - Strategic battle using various skills. - Keep an eye out for 'SP', the amount of magic powers available during battle. When it reaches zero...
